name: Clawed Cult
description:
Clawed Cult: A Reverse Bullet Hell Adventure!

Enter the strange world of Clawed Cult, where cute animals worship the ancient evil deity known as Catchulhu. As a cultist, you must navigate through hordes of enemies formed by previous failed summoning rituals, using powerful weapons and cunning strategies to survive the infinite hordes of enemies that stands in your way.

Take control of the chaos, raining destruction down upon your foes while dodging their attacks. As you progress, you'll invoke and fight larger and more fearsome creatures, in order to use their power to call your elder god.

Will you be able to master the art of the reverse bullet hell and invoke Catchulhu? Only the bravest and most cunning cultists will survive to bask in the glory of the ancient deity!

  • Reverse bullet hell mechanics for a unique and challenging gameplay experience;
  • Cute and creepy cultist animals, each with their own unique abilities and weapons;
  • A Lovecraftian world filled with mysterious and ancient creatures;
  • Hordes of enemies, each with their own attack patterns and abilities;
  • Upgradeable weapons and abilities, allowing you to become even more powerful as you progress;
  • Adaptative music: listen to new soundtrack everytime that matches the rythm of your gameplay!
Controls:
  • WASD: Move
  • Space: Dash
  • Mouse Click: Navigate Menus
  • Escape (Esc): Pause

Since we want the best lovecraftian cult organized by cute animals, there's still a lot of work to do. These are our next steps to imerse you even more into the Clawed Cult:

  • Create more abilities and weapons;
  • 2 (two) characters ready to add (even more on their way!)
  • New maps and challenges;
  • Climate System to generate more randomness to your adventures;
  • Twitch integration! Play with your favorite streamer!
  • Open our Discord community!
  • Solve bugs and increase performance;

Feel free to reach us for any bug report and follow us to stay tuned on our social media for what's coming next!
